description.narrative: The objective of the intervention is to contribute to the strengthening of the Bolivian democracy by promoting an integral participation of the youth and women in political parties, in five selected regional governments and in the National Electoral Body. The five chosen regional governments to consolidate the present initiative are La Paz Santa Cruz, Cochabamba, Tarija and Beni. The main reason behind the selection of these five regions is related to the managerial skills that these regions have developed, meaning that other regions, like Oruro or Potosi, were found to have severe limitations in their managerial capabilities. During the first phase of IDEA's work (2016-2018), IDEA already justified the selection of these five regions. Moreover, additional time and financial resources would have been necessary to develop the initiative in the remaining four Bolivian regions. By the end of the intervention, it is expected that the following objectives will be met in each one of the five regional governments: i) regional governments implement new mechanisms of control and accountability, including transition instruments, to better execute their regional public policies; ii) the proposal "parity is now", to eradicate political harassment and political violence against women has been implemented in the targeted local governments, iii) the youth has been given enough space to deliberate, interact and propose an agenda of public policies (Agenda from the Youth) to be prioritized by regional governments, and iv) the national electoral authority has strengthened its institutional capacity to guarantee the quality of electoral services in the country.

Det projekt som föreslås av IDEA International syftar till att bidra till att stärka den bolivianska demokratin och utövandet av medborgarnas rättigheter genom att främja deltagandet av ungdoms- och kvinnorganisationer, samt samordningen med de politiska partierna, de autonoma regionala regeringerna (GAD) och den nationella valmyndigheten. Insatsen genomförs utifrån fyra huvudlinjer med syfte att förbättra: i) offentlig förvaltning, ii) kvinnornas politiska deltagande, iii) ungdomspolitiska deltagande, och iv) valmyndighetens institutionella kapacitet. Det anses vara en fortsättning på bidraget 55180029 (Kvinnors ledarskap och medborgarnas deltagande på lokal nivå - IDEA)

The project proposed by IDEA International seeks to contribute to the strengthening of the Bolivian democracy and to the full exercise of citizen rights, by promoting a coordinated participation between youth and women's organizations, the political parties, the autonomous departmental governments (GAD) and the National Electoral Body. The four strategic lines of action that will guide IDEA's initiative to achieve its objectives are aimed to enhance: i)public management, ii) the women's political participation, iii) the youth's political participation, and iv) the institutional capacity of the electoral body. It is considered to be a continuation of contribution 55180029 (Women Leadership and Citizen Participation at the local level - IDEA)

International Institute for Democracy and Electoral Assistance

tag.narrative: 5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
